It is with a heavy heart we announce the passing of Mr. Robert Puckett last Saturday, of COVID-19 issues, at the age of 94.
Mr. Puckett was a retired educator who spent many of his final years as a substitute teacher, most frequently for the Hillcrest School District.
He was a also a retired military officer who served in the U.S Marine Corps (WWII), the U.S Army (1947-48), and the U.S Air Force (Korea, Cold War, Vietnam). He began to serve his nation in 1943, and retired from those duties in 1969. In that time, he received numerous honors for his service.
Mr. Puckett graciously joined Hillcrest High School to lead us in the Pledge of Allegiance at last November's Veterans Day Assembly. He is pictured here on that occasion.
